title: LymphaticVessel
description: A type of blood vessel that specifically carries lymph fluid unidirectionally toward the heart.

regionDrained.description: The anatomical or organ system drained by this vessel; generally refers to a specific part of an organ.

runsTo.description: The vasculature the lymphatic structure runs, or efferents, to.

originatesFrom.description: The vasculature the lymphatic structure originates, or afferents, from.
